name: getGroups
rule:
select 
gmv.gid AS gid,
-- gmv.vipid AS vipid,
gmv.fname AS fname,
gmv.lname AS lname,
gmv.created_vipid AS created_vipid,
gmv.created_dt AS created_dt,
date(gmv.expiration_dt) AS expiration_dt,
gmv.email AS email
from 
	(select vgm.gid,vgm.vipid,n.fname,n.lname,vgm.created_vipid,vgm.created_dt,vgm.expiration_dt,n.maildrop AS email
	 from 
	 vip_group_member vgm LEFT JOIN 
	 names n on (n.badge=vgm.vipid)  
	 UNION 
	 select gm.gid,gm.vipid,v.fname,v.lname,gm.created_vipid,gm.created_dt,gm.expiration_dt,v.email AS email
	 from 
	 vip_group_member gm LEFT JOIN 
	 vip v ON (v.vipid=gm.vipid) 
	 WHERE (v.fname IS NOT NULL and v.lname IS NOT NULL)
	) gmv LEFT JOIN
	vip_group g ON (g.gid=gmv.gid)
	WHERE
	g.gid in (217,219)
